#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long int t,i,j,m,n;
	cin>>t;
	string a;
	while(t--)
	{
		int b;
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
		int p=0;
		int d=a.length();
		for(i=0;i<d;i++)
		{
			 p=(p+(a[i]-48))%b;
			if(p==0)
			{
				if(i==d-1)
				{
					cout<<"YES"<<endl;
					break;
				}
				//continue;
			}
			else
			{
				if(i==d-1)
				{
					cout<<"NO"<<endl;
					break;
				}
				 p=p*10;
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	return 0;
	
}
